explains: adj. 品貌兼优的；英俊潇洒的；和蔼可亲的

sentences.en: The people I met were intelligent, mature, personable.
sentences.cn: 我见到的是一些聪明、成熟、品貌兼优的人。

sentences.en: Jeremy excepted, the men seemed personable.
sentences.cn: 除了杰里米，那些男人都显得风度翩翩。

sentences.en: He is bright, personable and resourceful.
sentences.cn: 他聪明、机敏而且讨人喜欢。
